title: [ViewManager for tag 1987 could not be found] error when installing stickers [android]
body:
# Problem
Error occurred when installing stickers by autotest
https://ethstatus.testrail.net/index.php?/tests/view/642307

Can't reproduce manually

```
java.lang.RuntimeException: com.facebook.react.uimanager.IllegalViewOperationException: ViewManager for tag 1987 could not be found
```

# Logs


```
--------- beginning of crash
```
